title: Mapping records created from a service definition record
content:
The following tables list those fields and associations whose contents are, by default, copied to a record created from a service definition record.

Service definition record to new article or news record

Change record field Article record field
Description Article Content
Title Title
ID Service

Related topics

  • Mapping records created from an incident record
  • Mapping records created from a problem record
  • Mapping records created from a request record
  • Mapping records created from an idea record
